text: Join us on March 4 for #TheHillVaccine. @WVGovernor  Jim Justice, @MayorOfLA Eric Garcetti, @AdCouncil President Lisa Sherman & more will join to discuss the value of fact-based health communication and building trust in the #COVID19 #vaccine. Register: https://t.co/ao4E1UlvgD https://t.co/QURWis0Uzy
